LanguageData.VV_NHCP_AquaticReedPlant.label: aquatic reed plant
LanguageData.VV_NHCP_AquaticReedPlant.description: Unlike its cousin that has been bred to thrive outside of marshes, this type requires marshy, water-logged ground, and produces a smaller usable yield but in a shorter amount of time. It is valued for its strong stalks, which are valuable materials for construction and crafting.
